From a gameplay perspective, Half-Life Source is nearly identical to Half-Life GoldSrc. However, Half-Life Source has an insane amount of glitches. For example, there are extreme graphical glitches in "We've Got Hostiles", the tentacles from Blast Pit don't do any damage to the player, scientists may levitate, guns will be invisible, etc. The only reason you should buy Half-Life Source is if you want the GMod assets. Besides that, there is no reason to buy this over Half-Life GoldSrc.

Having played HL2, I decided to go back and play the first one. Half-life 2 seems very much the logical evolution of this game. While some aspects are limited by the technology of the day, the game still thoroughly impressed me. Despite a few small glitches, which can be attributed to the age, the game holds up very well. Great sound design, varied and fast combat, interesting mechanics, and a nice sense of freedom. Though it is a linear game, there always seems there is something hidden to discover. Took me about 8 hours to finish it, I definitely recommend picking this up on a sale and blowing through it on a weekend. Now here's to waiting for Half-life 3 :))))

This is the big one, THE classic of classics. 
You can talk about DOOM Guy, Duke, and Master Chief all you like, but Gordon Freeman was the one who showed us that the First Person Shooter could be more than a mindless carnival ride of over-the-top violence and destruction a la DOOM and Duke Nukem. 
This is the game that started the FPS dynasty. Buy the Source version, buy the original, it doesn't matter--just  get it and experience it.

Half-Life: Source è un port della versione originale di Half-Life (la versione originale usa l'engine Goldsrc) al motore grafico Source. Questa versione è quasi uguale alla versione originale a parte gli effetti sull'acqua, piccoli miglioramenti grafici e i SFX mischiati con quelli di Half-Life 2. Non la consiglio perchè presenta diversi bug:
- I tentacoli giganti non fanno danni, da quello che ho visto è un bug storico e non ancora risolto
- Il gioco ha alcuni bug grafici durante la parte dei carrelli scorrevoli e fuori Black Mesa
Vi consiglio di giocarvi l'originale e anche Black Mesa.

全新升级的半条命1崭新出厂，用更加出色的起源引擎制作的半条命1也许会带给你比老一版半条命1完全不一样的体验，画质与武器，角色与生物高清化了（就是这个水，四周都是像素不高的墙壁，就水是高清的，如同半条命2的水被移植了过来）如果你想体验原汁原味的高清半条命1，买这个准没错。如果你想体验更加高清的半条命1，出门左拐“黑山.起源”（Black.Mesa）不送，但价格会更贵。

bad port dont buy

This is a weird port, I kinda can't recommend this unless you're already a big half life fan, but you would obviously already own the goldsrc version anyway, it doesn't really have any new content apart from fancier lighting and maybe a higher texture quality but I don't think so. 

If you don't own the valve collection already then that is the only time you would need to buy this game, that being said I like this version as much as the original half life. If you like the original then you might as well play this, but if you only want this game because of it being in source then you might as well just buy Black Mesa instead, it's still in early access but it's literally just an upgrade to this.
I still enjoy it though and have this installed instead of the original half life, especially for the strange ass bugs like the "scientist floating on top of his chair glitch", the one chapter where everything might just be fucking pitch black and of course the super epic "look up and become invincible glitch" because valve decided that Gordon's entire model needs to move in the rotation of your camera or something.
i like it but i wish i can use mods on this game

Half-Life это хорошая игра , но ее переиздание Half-Life: Source вышедшая в 1 июня 2004 имеет много проблем такие как : баги лаги ужасное освещение и по пративникам не проходит урон и т.д .
Не рекомендую !

Also, ich kann sagen. Wer das beste Feeling haben will der greift zu Half Life wer es mit der Source Engine haben will um es zum Beispiel in Garry,s Mod zu nutzen sollte sich die Source Version holen. Kosten eh beide gleich viel. Wer nach einen Grafisch aktuellen Remake sucht soll sich das Spiel Black Mesa zulegen.

I recommend the original over this if you're new to Half-Life or just want more insight into the Half-Life universe. 

Why? Half-Life is flawless. "Source" isn't. 

I don't ever recall a single bug/glitch in Half-Life but 10-minutes into "Source" and I see a floating NPC. 

There are some improvements like the ragdoll physics and graphics, etc, but it's not enough for me. It's not just the aforementioned floating NPC but something about "Source" quickly broke my immersion and led me to uninstall it. It just didn't feel right. 

Look at some of the other reviews and look up the differences for yourself. There's plenty of information out there. But my view is that the original is the one to go for. 

[b] "Source". A good attempt at improving the original. A nice little experiment. It may be worth playing after the original just to experience it. [/b]

Покупать не рекомендую. Игра так себе раз и багована два. Графика улучшена местами и похожа на франкенштейна, как говорят люди мыло(растянутые текстуры) плюс детализация местами все выглядит инородно. Вещи некотороые блестят слишком сильно, оружие, некоторые места, ботинки пехотинцев. 
Баги такие есть:
Хитбокс вертолета о как же сложно попасть, в оригинале он проходится нормально.
Барнаклы могут вас засосать, но при этом щупальце то не свисает, просто как фишка не плохо, но в оригинале не так.
Гонарч плюет и после квадраты черные какие то.
Еще я застрял в проходе при наступлении вертолета и не мог выйти, но тут помогла загрузка.
Еще в одном месте поплыли текстуры скайбокса, у меня чуть голова не закружилась.

Локализация странная, местами на русском озвучка, там с костюмом связанные, а диалоги на английском.

Пройти то можно, но зачем? Если в оригинале нет таких ошибок и игрется приятней.
